Issue.creator: avkrishnan
Issue.summary: POOL_UPGRADE needs to support different hashes and signatures for different platforms
Issue.description: Since source code can be different on different platforms the hash of the code and signature will differ too. The POOL_UPGRADE txns should indicate to which platforms the upgrade is targeted. This also helps in a scenario where we did not support platform *X* till version 9 but started supporting *X* in version 10, now when a node joins the pool which is on *X* does not need to do upgrades till version 9 but only for version 10
